Fun Fact: The striped hyenas usually mark their territories with the help of the scent gland secretions from their anal pouch.
Habitat: Deserts, semi-deserts, woodlands, scrub forests, acacia bushlands, grasslands, tropical savannas, and rocky terrains
Location: Africa, West India, the Middle East, and the Arabian Peninsula
Height: 1 – 1.15 meters in length. Their tail measures about 12.5 inches
Length: 1 – 1.15 meters in length. Their tail measures about 12.5 inches
Name: Striped Hyena
